name: Vihltara Exploration Demo
description:
Since the game is quite far from complete, I have decided to upload this Pre-Alpha version, which will give you the opportunity to explore one of Vihltara's regions and try out a few of the unique gameplay mechanics. Note that this is an unstable(ish) build and may have bugs that will be fixed in later versions.

To make this version a little fun, a prototype quest is available: 52 Aluti's are hidden around Seirubi. Can you find them all?
